about.whyMeText: I love solving problems creatively. Programming allows me to combine analytical thinking with creativity – and that’s exactly what excites me. I enjoy learning new things, constantly growing, and finding thoughtful solutions to complex challenges. For me, code is more than just technology – it’s a way to bring ideas to life with structure and purpose.

skills.ChallengeMeContent: I am always happy to learn new technologies, just tell me what you need.

testimonial.header: Need a teamplayer? Here’s what my colleagues said about me
testimonial.content1: I had the opportunity to work with Felix on a project and got to know him as a highly reliable, thoughtful, and pleasant person. In the frontend, he impressed with his structured approach, technical understanding, and clearly written code. We’ve stayed in touch even after the project ended – which speaks to how positive the collaboration was.
testimonial.content2: Felix has been a highly committed and cooperative partner. Thanks to his expertise, he was an extremely reliable point of contact for any questions or issues. It was a pleasure working with him, and I would gladly do so again!

contact.contacContent: As a frontend developer focused on modern web applications, I’m looking for new challenges and exciting projects. I’d be happy to support your team – feel free to reach out.
contact.agreeContent: I’ve read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contact.name: Your name

privacyPolicy:
Privacy Policy

Effective Date: April 25, 2025

Felix Geiss

First Name Last Name
Fanny-Leicht-Str. 4
70563 Stuttgart-Vaihingen

E-mail: geissq@gmail.com

Purpose of This Website

This website exists solely to showcase my portfolio and provide a means of contacting me.

Data Collection and Processing

Any personal data you submit (e.g., name, email address, message) via the contact form or by email is used exclusively to respond to your inquiry. Data will not be shared with third parties.

Legal Basis

Processing is based on Art. 6(1)(b) and (f) of the GDPR.

Data Retention

Your data will be deleted once it is no longer needed to process your request or if you object to its storage.

Your Rights

  • Access, correction, and deletion of your data
  • Restriction of processing
  • Objection to processing
  • Right to data portability
  • Complaint to a supervisory authority

Contact

If you have any questions, please contact me at

E-mail: geissq@gmail.com.

Changes

This privacy policy may be updated from time to time; the latest version will always be available here.
